name: NSFileProviderTestingIngestion
desc: An operation that alerts the system to either local or remote storage changes.

items.name: var itemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for the item that changed.

items.name: var item: NSFileProviderItem?
items.desc: A description of the item that changed.

items.name: var side: NSFileProviderTestingOperationSide
items.desc: The location where the change occurred.
